alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Grafton; Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 2:12PM EST until December 19 at 8:30AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Smith River At Bristol affecting Belknap, Grafton and Merrimack Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Smith River at Bristol. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM EST Monday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 8.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
